data.oai_dc:dc: In a greenhouse experiment, we grew Jacobaea vulgaris plants in soil conditioned by 10 plant species, in a multispecies mixture, or in unconditioned (mixed field) soil. For all soils, we measured fungal community composition For each plant, we recorded biomass, chemistry (amino acids and pyrrolizidine alkaloids (PA) in phloem exudates), performance of a specialist and a generalist aphidBiomass and chemistry were measured at 2 sampling times: 6 and 13 weeks after transplanting in the conditioned soils
Amino acids|Aphid|Plant-soil (below-ground) interactions|Pyrrolizidine alkaloids|Soil fungal community
